content.arrabic: نَوَيْتُ صَوْمَ غَدٍ عَنْ أَدَاءِ سُنَّةِ ِعَا شُورَاء لِلهِ تَعَالَى
content.latin: Nawaitu shauma ghadin 'an ada'i sunnati 'Asyura lillâhi ta‘âlâ.

translation.id: Saya berniat berpuasa sunnah Asyura karena Allah ta’âlâ.
translation.en: I intend to perform the sunnah fast of Ashura for the sake of Allah Ta‘âlâ.
